import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import logo from '../../assets/logo.png' import search from '../../assets/search-solid.svg' import Avatar from '../../components/Avatar/Avatar' import { setCurrentUser } from '../../actions/currentUser' import './Navbar.css' const Navbar = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() var User = useSelector((state) => (state.currentUserReducer)) useEffect(() => { dispatch(setCurrentUser( JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('Profile')))) }),[dispatch] return (
About Products For Teams
{ User === null ? Log in : <> M }
) } export default Navbar
